amendment.description: Amendment sought to shorten the reauthorization period for the Voting Rights Act from 25 years to 10 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-554 to make the reauthorization period 10 years, rather than the 25 years proposed in the act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 288 (Roll no. 371).
